cgcloud__RTR_Report_Configuration__c.name: cgcloud__RTR_Report_Configuration__c
cgcloud__RTR_Report_Configuration__c.description: This object contains Real Time Report (RTR) Configurations. One record defines the data that's to be loaded for a report and what or how it gets shown in a declarative manner.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Internal_Name__c.description: Unique key for the configuration of the report: concatenation of the report name, usage, and sales org. This object ensures that no duplicate reports or configurations exist on the same Sales org.

cgcloud__Usage__c.description: Type of report or type of configuration.
